owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._wrappedNativeToken: Address of wrapped native token (WETH, WBNB, etc.)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getChainConfig(uint16).notice: Get complete configuration for a chain

getCurrentChainId().notice: Get current chain ID (the chain this registry is deployed on)

getEidForChainId(uint256).notice: Get LayerZero EID for a chain ID

getLayerZeroEndpoint(uint16).notice: Get LayerZero endpoint for a specific chain

getSupportedChainCount().notice: Get total number of supported chains

isChainSupported(uint16).notice: Check if a chain is supported and registered

setChainIdToEid(uint256,uint32).notice: Set Chain ID to LayerZero EID mapping

setLayerZeroEndpoint(uint16,address).notice: Update LayerZero endpoint for a chain
